title: Accessibility problems in Bug 12398
description: When accessing the Help view, I need to first click on one of the "live" areas (such as the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame) before it starts working. This is causing accessibility issues as the Help view should be navigable via the keyboard from the beginning.
OB: When accessing the Help view, I need to click on one of the "live" areas before it starts working.
EB: The Help view should be starting in a way that can be immediately navigated using the keyboard.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the application and navigate to the Help view. 
2. Attempt to navigate through the Help view using only the keyboard.
